title: California Board to Hold First Meeting on Clean-Energy Fund
text:
08 California Board to Hold First Meeting on Clean-Energy Fund 
ABC News: A citizens board overseeing energy efficiency projects will meet for the first time Tuesday after The Associated Press reported that the panel had yet to meet three years after California voters approved raising taxes on corporations to create clean-energy jobs.
